content:
The UX for using Zulip with a mouse has a lot of issues, and my guess is the vast majority of users (certainly, people doing trials) navigate Zulip using the mouse.

We do need to improve the mouse navigation, but until then, are there stopgap things we can do to teach n?
We could have a hotspot type thing that triggers on your having an unread message and only becomes happy when you use n at least once.
